text: is a former Japanese football player. ==Playing career== Yabusaki was born in Chiba on June 1, 1978. After graduating from high school, he joined his local club Kashiwa Reysol in 1997. However he could not play at all in the match until 1999. On November 18, 2000, he debuted against Kawasaki Frontale.J.League He did not get many chances to play and left at the end of the 2002 season. ==Club statistics== |- |1997||rowspan="6"|Kashiwa Reysol||rowspan="6"|J.
